subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Montreal will be added to the Busch Series schedule in 2007 with a road-course event at Circuit Gilles-Villeneuve on Aug. 4.
snippet: Montreal will be added to the Busch Series schedule in 2007 with a road-course event at Circuit Gilles-Villeneuve on Aug. 4.
